description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age provided by author in months in data file
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day – numerical
the type of mirror the participants were exposed to -   large / small
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
duration of the session in milliseconds
duration of the condition in milliseconds
count of mirror-related behaviors (mrb) – e.g. holding/manipulating/exploring/social responses to the reflection etc.
duration of all mrbs in milliseconds
proportion of mrb time within a session
count of self exploration (se) behaviours
duration of all self explorations (se) in milliseconds
proportion of se time within a session
